document.full_text: hertz global holdings inc  fired the latest salvo in a 13-month-long battle for dollar thrifty automotive group inc , offering nearly $2.1 billion as it looks to form the no. 2 u.s. car rental firm and bump a stalled bid from avis budget group inc .
document.title: hertz makes new dollar thrifty bid of $2.1 billion
lines_and_colors: hertz global holdings inc  fired the latest salvo in a 13-month-long battle for dollar thrifty automotive group inc , offering nearly $2.1 billion as it looks to form the no. 2 u.s. car rental firm and bump a stalled bid from avis budget group inc .
